name: Crown of Dominion [prototype]
description:
A quick prototype I made while thinking of some unique gameplay styles.

You are the Crown of Dominion, a sentient headpiece that has the ability to take full control over whomever wears it.

CONTROLS

Q - DETACH/FLOAT CROWN

RMB (FLOATING) - MOVE/POSESS

WSAD (POSESS) - MOVE

LMB (POSESS) - ATTACK

R - Restart
